26#define SUBSAMPLE(v, a, s) (v < 0) ? (-((-v + a) >> s)) : ((v + a) >> s)
27static __inline int Abs(int v) {
28 return v >= 0 ? v : -v;
29}
30
31// Any I4xx To I420 format with mirroring.
32static int I4xxToI420(const uint8_t* src_y,
33 int src_stride_y,
34 const uint8_t* src_u,
35 int src_stride_u,
36 const uint8_t* src_v,
37 int src_stride_v,
38 uint8_t* dst_y,
39 int dst_stride_y,
40 uint8_t* dst_u,
41 int dst_stride_u,
42 uint8_t* dst_v,
43 int dst_stride_v,
44 int src_y_width,
45 int src_y_height,
46 int src_uv_width,
47 int src_uv_height) {
48 const int dst_y_width = Abs(src_y_width);
49 const int dst_y_height = Abs(src_y_height);
50 const int dst_uv_width = SUBSAMPLE(dst_y_width, 1, 1);
51 const int dst_uv_height = SUBSAMPLE(dst_y_height, 1, 1);
52 if (src_uv_width <= 0 || src_uv_height == 0) {
53 return -1;
54 }
55 if (dst_y) {
56 ScalePlane(src_y, src_stride_y, src_y_width, src_y_height, dst_y,
57 dst_stride_y, dst_y_width, dst_y_height, kFilterBilinear);
58 }
59 ScalePlane(src_u, src_stride_u, src_uv_width, src_uv_height, dst_u,
60 dst_stride_u, dst_uv_width, dst_uv_height, kFilterBilinear);
61 ScalePlane(src_v, src_stride_v, src_uv_width, src_uv_height, dst_v,
62 dst_stride_v, dst_uv_width, dst_uv_height, kFilterBilinear);
63 return 0;
64}
65
66// Copy I420 with optional flipping.
67// TODO(fbarchard): Use Scale plane which supports mirroring, but ensure
68// is does row coalescing.
69LIBYUV_API
70int I420Copy(const uint8_t* src_y,
71 int src_stride_y,
72 const uint8_t* src_u,
73 int src_stride_u,
74 const uint8_t* src_v,
75 int src_stride_v,
76 uint8_t* dst_y,
77 int dst_stride_y,
78 uint8_t* dst_u,
79 int dst_stride_u,
80 uint8_t* dst_v,
81 int dst_stride_v,
82 int width,
83 int height) {
84 int halfwidth = (width + 1) >> 1;
85 int halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
86 if (!src_u || !src_v || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
87 return -1;
88 }
89 // Negative height means invert the image.
90 if (height < 0) {
91 height = -height;
92 halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
93 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
94 src_u = src_u + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_u;
95 src_v = src_v + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_v;
96 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
97 src_stride_u = -src_stride_u;
98 src_stride_v = -src_stride_v;
99 }
100
101 if (dst_y) {
102 CopyPlane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, width, height);
103 }
104 // Copy UV planes.
105 CopyPlane(src_u, src_stride_u, dst_u, dst_stride_u, halfwidth, halfheight);
106 CopyPlane(src_v, src_stride_v, dst_v, dst_stride_v, halfwidth, halfheight);
107 return 0;
108}
109
110// Copy I010 with optional flipping.
111LIBYUV_API
112int I010Copy(const uint16_t* src_y,
113 int src_stride_y,
114 const uint16_t* src_u,
115 int src_stride_u,
116 const uint16_t* src_v,
117 int src_stride_v,
118 uint16_t* dst_y,
119 int dst_stride_y,
120 uint16_t* dst_u,
121 int dst_stride_u,
122 uint16_t* dst_v,
123 int dst_stride_v,
124 int width,
125 int height) {
126 int halfwidth = (width + 1) >> 1;
127 int halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
128 if (!src_u || !src_v || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
129 return -1;
130 }
131 // Negative height means invert the image.
132 if (height < 0) {
133 height = -height;
134 halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
135 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
136 src_u = src_u + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_u;
137 src_v = src_v + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_v;
138 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
139 src_stride_u = -src_stride_u;
140 src_stride_v = -src_stride_v;
141 }
142
143 if (dst_y) {
144 CopyPlane_16(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, width, height);
145 }
146 // Copy UV planes.
147 CopyPlane_16(src_u, src_stride_u, dst_u, dst_stride_u, halfwidth, halfheight);
148 CopyPlane_16(src_v, src_stride_v, dst_v, dst_stride_v, halfwidth, halfheight);
149 return 0;
150}
151
152static int Planar16bitTo8bit(const uint16_t* src_y,
153 int src_stride_y,
154 const uint16_t* src_u,
155 int src_stride_u,
156 const uint16_t* src_v,
157 int src_stride_v,
158 uint8_t* dst_y,
159 int dst_stride_y,
160 uint8_t* dst_u,
161 int dst_stride_u,
162 uint8_t* dst_v,
163 int dst_stride_v,
164 int width,
165 int height,
166 int subsample_x,
167 int subsample_y,
168 int depth) {
169 int uv_width = SUBSAMPLE(width, subsample_x, subsample_x);
170 int uv_height = SUBSAMPLE(height, subsample_y, subsample_y);
171 int scale = 1 << (24 - depth);
172 if (!src_u || !src_v || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
173 return -1;
174 }
175 // Negative height means invert the image.
176 if (height < 0) {
177 height = -height;
178 uv_height = -uv_height;
179 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
180 src_u = src_u + (uv_height - 1) * src_stride_u;
181 src_v = src_v + (uv_height - 1) * src_stride_v;
182 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
183 src_stride_u = -src_stride_u;
184 src_stride_v = -src_stride_v;
185 }
186
187 // Convert Y plane.
188 Convert16To8Plane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, scale, width,
189 height);
190 // Convert UV planes.
191 Convert16To8Plane(src_u, src_stride_u, dst_u, dst_stride_u, scale, uv_width,
192 uv_height);
193 Convert16To8Plane(src_v, src_stride_v, dst_v, dst_stride_v, scale, uv_width,
194 uv_height);
195 return 0;
196}
197
198// Convert 10 bit YUV to 8 bit.
199LIBYUV_API
200int I010ToI420(const uint16_t* src_y,
201 int src_stride_y,
202 const uint16_t* src_u,
203 int src_stride_u,
204 const uint16_t* src_v,
205 int src_stride_v,
206 uint8_t* dst_y,
207 int dst_stride_y,
208 uint8_t* dst_u,
209 int dst_stride_u,
210 uint8_t* dst_v,
211 int dst_stride_v,
212 int width,
213 int height) {
214 return Planar16bitTo8bit(src_y, src_stride_y, src_u, src_stride_u, src_v,
215 src_stride_v, dst_y, dst_stride_y, dst_u,
216 dst_stride_u, dst_v, dst_stride_v, width, height, 1,
217 1, 10);
218}

325// Any Ix10 To I010 format with mirroring.
326static int Ix10ToI010(const uint16_t* src_y,
327 int src_stride_y,
328 const uint16_t* src_u,
329 int src_stride_u,
330 const uint16_t* src_v,
331 int src_stride_v,
332 uint16_t* dst_y,
333 int dst_stride_y,
334 uint16_t* dst_u,
335 int dst_stride_u,
336 uint16_t* dst_v,
337 int dst_stride_v,
338 int width,
339 int height,
340 int subsample_x,
341 int subsample_y) {
342 const int dst_y_width = Abs(width);
343 const int dst_y_height = Abs(height);
344 const int src_uv_width = SUBSAMPLE(width, subsample_x, subsample_x);
345 const int src_uv_height = SUBSAMPLE(height, subsample_y, subsample_y);
346 const int dst_uv_width = SUBSAMPLE(dst_y_width, 1, 1);
347 const int dst_uv_height = SUBSAMPLE(dst_y_height, 1, 1);
348 if (width <= 0 || height == 0) {
349 return -1;
350 }
351 if (dst_y) {
352 ScalePlane_12(src_y, src_stride_y, width, height, dst_y, dst_stride_y,
353 dst_y_width, dst_y_height, kFilterBilinear);
354 }
355 ScalePlane_12(src_u, src_stride_u, src_uv_width, src_uv_height, dst_u,
356 dst_stride_u, dst_uv_width, dst_uv_height, kFilterBilinear);
357 ScalePlane_12(src_v, src_stride_v, src_uv_width, src_uv_height, dst_v,
358 dst_stride_v, dst_uv_width, dst_uv_height, kFilterBilinear);
359 return 0;
360}

379 dst_v, dst_stride_v, width, height, 0, 0);

402// Any I[420]1[02] to P[420]1[02] format with mirroring.
403static int IxxxToPxxx(const uint16_t* src_y,
404 int src_stride_y,
405 const uint16_t* src_u,
406 int src_stride_u,
407 const uint16_t* src_v,
408 int src_stride_v,
409 uint16_t* dst_y,
410 int dst_stride_y,
411 uint16_t* dst_uv,
412 int dst_stride_uv,
413 int width,
414 int height,
415 int subsample_x,
416 int subsample_y,
417 int depth) {
418 const int uv_width = SUBSAMPLE(width, subsample_x, subsample_x);
419 const int uv_height = SUBSAMPLE(height, subsample_y, subsample_y);
420 if (width <= 0 || height == 0) {
421 return -1;
422 }
423
424 ConvertToMSBPlane_16(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, width, height,
425 depth);
426 MergeUVPlane_16(src_u, src_stride_u, src_v, src_stride_v, dst_uv,
427 dst_stride_uv, uv_width, uv_height, depth);
428 return 0;
429}

446 width, height, 1, 1, 10);

503// 422 chroma is 1/2 width, 1x height
504// 420 chroma is 1/2 width, 1/2 height
505LIBYUV_API
506int I422ToI420(const uint8_t* src_y,
507 int src_stride_y,
508 const uint8_t* src_u,
509 int src_stride_u,
510 const uint8_t* src_v,
511 int src_stride_v,
512 uint8_t* dst_y,
513 int dst_stride_y,
514 uint8_t* dst_u,
515 int dst_stride_u,
516 uint8_t* dst_v,
517 int dst_stride_v,
518 int width,
519 int height) {
520 const int src_uv_width = SUBSAMPLE(width, 1, 1);
521 return I4xxToI420(src_y, src_stride_y, src_u, src_stride_u, src_v,
522 src_stride_v, dst_y, dst_stride_y, dst_u, dst_stride_u,
523 dst_v, dst_stride_v, width, height, src_uv_width, height);
524}
525
526// TODO(fbarchard): Implement row conversion.
527LIBYUV_API
528int I422ToNV21(const uint8_t* src_y,
529 int src_stride_y,
530 const uint8_t* src_u,
531 int src_stride_u,
532 const uint8_t* src_v,
533 int src_stride_v,
534 uint8_t* dst_y,
535 int dst_stride_y,
536 uint8_t* dst_vu,
537 int dst_stride_vu,
538 int width,
539 int height) {
540 int halfwidth = (width + 1) >> 1;
541 int halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
542 // Negative height means invert the image.
543 if (height < 0) {
544 height = -height;
545 halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
546 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
547 src_u = src_u + (height - 1) * src_stride_u;
548 src_v = src_v + (height - 1) * src_stride_v;
549 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
550 src_stride_u = -src_stride_u;
551 src_stride_v = -src_stride_v;
552 }
553
554 // Allocate u and v buffers
555 align_buffer_64(plane_u, halfwidth * halfheight * 2);
556 uint8_t* plane_v = plane_u + halfwidth * halfheight;
557
558 I422ToI420(src_y, src_stride_y, src_u, src_stride_u, src_v, src_stride_v,
559 dst_y, dst_stride_y, plane_u, halfwidth, plane_v, halfwidth, width,
560 height);
561 MergeUVPlane(plane_v, halfwidth, plane_u, halfwidth, dst_vu, dst_stride_vu,
562 halfwidth, halfheight);
563 free_aligned_buffer_64(plane_u);
564 return 0;
565}
566
567#ifdef I422TONV21_ROW_VERSION
568// Unittest fails for this version.
569// 422 chroma is 1/2 width, 1x height
570// 420 chroma is 1/2 width, 1/2 height
571// Swap src_u and src_v to implement I422ToNV12
572LIBYUV_API
573int I422ToNV21(const uint8_t* src_y,
574 int src_stride_y,
575 const uint8_t* src_u,
576 int src_stride_u,
577 const uint8_t* src_v,
578 int src_stride_v,
579 uint8_t* dst_y,
580 int dst_stride_y,
581 uint8_t* dst_vu,
582 int dst_stride_vu,
583 int width,
584 int height) {
585 int y;
586 void (*MergeUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_u, const uint8_t* src_v,
587 uint8_t* dst_uv, int width) = MergeUVRow_C;
588 void (*InterpolateRow)(uint8_t * dst_ptr, const uint8_t* src_ptr,
589 ptrdiff_t src_stride, int dst_width,
590 int source_y_fraction) = InterpolateRow_C;
591 int halfwidth = (width + 1) >> 1;
592 int halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
593 if (!src_u || !src_v || !dst_vu || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
594 return -1;
595 }
596 // Negative height means invert the image.
597 if (height < 0) {
598 height = -height;
599 halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
600 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
601 src_u = src_u + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_u;
602 src_v = src_v + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_v;
603 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
604 src_stride_u = -src_stride_u;
605 src_stride_v = -src_stride_v;
606 }
607#if defined(HAS_MERGEUVROW_SSE2)
608 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
609 MergeUVRow = MergeUVRow_Any_SSE2;
610 if (IS_ALIGNED(halfwidth, 16)) {
611 MergeUVRow = MergeUVRow_SSE2;
612 }
613 }
614#endif
615#if defined(HAS_MERGEUVROW_AVX2)
616 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
617 MergeUVRow = MergeUVRow_Any_AVX2;
618 if (IS_ALIGNED(halfwidth, 32)) {
619 MergeUVRow = MergeUVRow_AVX2;
620 }
621 }
622#endif
623#if defined(HAS_MERGEUVROW_NEON)
624 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
625 MergeUVRow = MergeUVRow_Any_NEON;
626 if (IS_ALIGNED(halfwidth, 16)) {
627 MergeUVRow = MergeUVRow_NEON;
628 }
629 }
630#endif
631#if defined(HAS_MERGEUVROW_MMI)
632 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
633 MergeUVRow = MergeUVRow_Any_MMI;
634 if (IS_ALIGNED(halfwidth, 8)) {
635 MergeUVRow = MergeUVRow_MMI;
636 }
637 }
638#endif
639#if defined(HAS_MERGEUVROW_MSA)
640 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
641 MergeUVRow = MergeUVRow_Any_MSA;
642 if (IS_ALIGNED(halfwidth, 16)) {
643 MergeUVRow = MergeUVRow_MSA;
644 }
645 }
646#endif
647#if defined(HAS_INTERPOLATEROW_SSSE3)
648 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
649 InterpolateRow = InterpolateRow_Any_SSSE3;
650 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
651 InterpolateRow = InterpolateRow_SSSE3;
652 }
653 }
654#endif
655#if defined(HAS_INTERPOLATEROW_AVX2)
656 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
657 InterpolateRow = InterpolateRow_Any_AVX2;
658 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
659 InterpolateRow = InterpolateRow_AVX2;
660 }
661 }
662#endif
663#if defined(HAS_INTERPOLATEROW_NEON)
664 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
665 InterpolateRow = InterpolateRow_Any_NEON;
666 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
667 InterpolateRow = InterpolateRow_NEON;
668 }
669 }
670#endif
671#if defined(HAS_INTERPOLATEROW_MMI)
672 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
673 InterpolateRow = InterpolateRow_Any_MMI;
674 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
675 InterpolateRow = InterpolateRow_MMI;
676 }
677 }
678#endif
679#if defined(HAS_INTERPOLATEROW_MSA)
680 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
681 InterpolateRow = InterpolateRow_Any_MSA;
682 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
683 InterpolateRow = InterpolateRow_MSA;
684 }
685 }
686#endif
687
688 if (dst_y) {
689 CopyPlane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, halfwidth, height);
690 }
691 {
692 // Allocate 2 rows of vu.
693 int awidth = halfwidth * 2;
694 align_buffer_64(row_vu_0, awidth * 2);
695 uint8_t* row_vu_1 = row_vu_0 + awidth;
696
697 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
698 MergeUVRow(src_v, src_u, row_vu_0, halfwidth);
699 MergeUVRow(src_v + src_stride_v, src_u + src_stride_u, row_vu_1,
700 halfwidth);
701 InterpolateRow(dst_vu, row_vu_0, awidth, awidth, 128);
702 src_u += src_stride_u * 2;
703 src_v += src_stride_v * 2;
704 dst_vu += dst_stride_vu;
705 }
706 if (height & 1) {
707 MergeUVRow(src_v, src_u, dst_vu, halfwidth);
708 }
709 free_aligned_buffer_64(row_vu_0);
710 }
711 return 0;
712}
713#endif // I422TONV21_ROW_VERSION
714
715// 444 chroma is 1x width, 1x height
716// 420 chroma is 1/2 width, 1/2 height
717LIBYUV_API
718int I444ToI420(const uint8_t* src_y,
719 int src_stride_y,
720 const uint8_t* src_u,
721 int src_stride_u,
722 const uint8_t* src_v,
723 int src_stride_v,
724 uint8_t* dst_y,
725 int dst_stride_y,
726 uint8_t* dst_u,
727 int dst_stride_u,
728 uint8_t* dst_v,
729 int dst_stride_v,
730 int width,
731 int height) {
732 return I4xxToI420(src_y, src_stride_y, src_u, src_stride_u, src_v,
733 src_stride_v, dst_y, dst_stride_y, dst_u, dst_stride_u,
734 dst_v, dst_stride_v, width, height, width, height);
735}
736
737LIBYUV_API
738int I444ToNV12(const uint8_t* src_y,
739 int src_stride_y,
740 const uint8_t* src_u,
741 int src_stride_u,
742 const uint8_t* src_v,
743 int src_stride_v,
744 uint8_t* dst_y,
745 int dst_stride_y,
746 uint8_t* dst_uv,
747 int dst_stride_uv,
748 int width,
749 int height) {
750 if (!src_y || !src_u || !src_v || !dst_y || !dst_uv || width <= 0 ||
751 height == 0) {
752 return -1;
753 }
754 // Negative height means invert the image.
755 if (height < 0) {
756 height = -height;
757 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
758 src_u = src_u + (height - 1) * src_stride_u;
759 src_v = src_v + (height - 1) * src_stride_v;
760 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
761 src_stride_u = -src_stride_u;
762 src_stride_v = -src_stride_v;
763 }
764 if (dst_y) {
765 CopyPlane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, width, height);
766 }
767 HalfMergeUVPlane(src_u, src_stride_u, src_v, src_stride_v, dst_uv,
768 dst_stride_uv, width, height);
769 return 0;
770}
771
772LIBYUV_API
773int I444ToNV21(const uint8_t* src_y,
774 int src_stride_y,
775 const uint8_t* src_u,
776 int src_stride_u,
777 const uint8_t* src_v,
778 int src_stride_v,
779 uint8_t* dst_y,
780 int dst_stride_y,
781 uint8_t* dst_vu,
782 int dst_stride_vu,
783 int width,
784 int height) {
785 return I444ToNV12(src_y, src_stride_y, src_v, src_stride_v, src_u,
786 src_stride_u, dst_y, dst_stride_y, dst_vu, dst_stride_vu,
787 width, height);
788}
789
790// I400 is greyscale typically used in MJPG
791LIBYUV_API
792int I400ToI420(const uint8_t* src_y,
793 int src_stride_y,
794 uint8_t* dst_y,
795 int dst_stride_y,
796 uint8_t* dst_u,
797 int dst_stride_u,
798 uint8_t* dst_v,
799 int dst_stride_v,
800 int width,
801 int height) {
802 int halfwidth = (width + 1) >> 1;
803 int halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
804 if (!dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
805 return -1;
806 }
807 // Negative height means invert the image.
808 if (height < 0) {
809 height = -height;
810 halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
811 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
812 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
813 }
814 if (dst_y) {
815 CopyPlane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, width, height);
816 }
817 SetPlane(dst_u, dst_stride_u, halfwidth, halfheight, 128);
818 SetPlane(dst_v, dst_stride_v, halfwidth, halfheight, 128);
819 return 0;
820}
821
822// I400 is greyscale typically used in MJPG
823LIBYUV_API
824int I400ToNV21(const uint8_t* src_y,
825 int src_stride_y,
826 uint8_t* dst_y,
827 int dst_stride_y,
828 uint8_t* dst_vu,
829 int dst_stride_vu,
830 int width,
831 int height) {
832 int halfwidth = (width + 1) >> 1;
833 int halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
834 if (!dst_vu || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
835 return -1;
836 }
837 // Negative height means invert the image.
838 if (height < 0) {
839 height = -height;
840 halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
841 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
842 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
843 }
844 if (dst_y) {
845 CopyPlane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, width, height);
846 }
847 SetPlane(dst_vu, dst_stride_vu, halfwidth * 2, halfheight, 128);
848 return 0;
849}
850
851// Convert NV12 to I420.
852// TODO(fbarchard): Consider inverting destination. Faster on ARM with prfm.
853LIBYUV_API
854int NV12ToI420(const uint8_t* src_y,
855 int src_stride_y,
856 const uint8_t* src_uv,
857 int src_stride_uv,
858 uint8_t* dst_y,
859 int dst_stride_y,
860 uint8_t* dst_u,
861 int dst_stride_u,
862 uint8_t* dst_v,
863 int dst_stride_v,
864 int width,
865 int height) {
866 int halfwidth = (width + 1) >> 1;
867 int halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
868 if (!src_uv || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
869 return -1;
870 }
871 // Negative height means invert the image.
872 if (height < 0) {
873 height = -height;
874 halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
875 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
876 src_uv = src_uv + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_uv;
877 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
878 src_stride_uv = -src_stride_uv;
879 }
880 // Coalesce rows.
881 if (src_stride_y == width && dst_stride_y == width) {
882 width *= height;
883 height = 1;
884 src_stride_y = dst_stride_y = 0;
885 }
886 // Coalesce rows.
887 if (src_stride_uv == halfwidth * 2 && dst_stride_u == halfwidth &&
888 dst_stride_v == halfwidth) {
889 halfwidth *= halfheight;
890 halfheight = 1;
891 src_stride_uv = dst_stride_u = dst_stride_v = 0;
892 }
893
894 if (dst_y) {
895 CopyPlane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, width, height);
896 }
897
898 // Split UV plane - NV12 / NV21
899 SplitUVPlane(src_uv, src_stride_uv, dst_u, dst_stride_u, dst_v, dst_stride_v,
900 halfwidth, halfheight);
901
902 return 0;
903}
904
905// Convert NV21 to I420. Same as NV12 but u and v pointers swapped.
906LIBYUV_API
907int NV21ToI420(const uint8_t* src_y,
908 int src_stride_y,
909 const uint8_t* src_vu,
910 int src_stride_vu,
911 uint8_t* dst_y,
912 int dst_stride_y,
913 uint8_t* dst_u,
914 int dst_stride_u,
915 uint8_t* dst_v,
916 int dst_stride_v,
917 int width,
918 int height) {
919 return NV12ToI420(src_y, src_stride_y, src_vu, src_stride_vu, dst_y,
920 dst_stride_y, dst_v, dst_stride_v, dst_u, dst_stride_u,
921 width, height);
922}
923
924LIBYUV_API
925int NV12ToNV24(const uint8_t* src_y,
926 int src_stride_y,
927 const uint8_t* src_uv,
928 int src_stride_uv,
929 uint8_t* dst_y,
930 int dst_stride_y,
931 uint8_t* dst_uv,
932 int dst_stride_uv,
933 int width,
934 int height) {
935 if (width <= 0 || height == 0) {
936 return -1;
937 }
938
939 if (dst_y) {
940 ScalePlane(src_y, src_stride_y, width, height, dst_y, dst_stride_y,
941 Abs(width), Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
942 }
943 UVScale(src_uv, src_stride_uv, SUBSAMPLE(width, 1, 1),
944 SUBSAMPLE(height, 1, 1), dst_uv, dst_stride_uv, Abs(width),
945 Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
946 return 0;
947}

949LIBYUV_API
950int NV16ToNV24(const uint8_t* src_y,
951 int src_stride_y,
952 const uint8_t* src_uv,
953 int src_stride_uv,
954 uint8_t* dst_y,
955 int dst_stride_y,
956 uint8_t* dst_uv,
957 int dst_stride_uv,
958 int width,
959 int height) {
960 if (width <= 0 || height == 0) {
961 return -1;
962 }
963
964 if (dst_y) {
965 ScalePlane(src_y, src_stride_y, width, height, dst_y, dst_stride_y,
966 Abs(width), Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
967 }
968 UVScale(src_uv, src_stride_uv, SUBSAMPLE(width, 1, 1), height, dst_uv,
969 dst_stride_uv, Abs(width), Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
970 return 0;
971}

979 int dst_stride_y,

982 int width,
983 int height) {

985 return -1;

988 if (dst_y) {
989 ScalePlane_16(src_y, src_stride_y, width, height, dst_y, dst_stride_y,

991 }
992 UVScale_16(src_uv, src_stride_uv, SUBSAMPLE(width, 1, 1),
993 SUBSAMPLE(height, 1, 1), dst_uv, dst_stride_uv, Abs(width),
994 Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
995 return 0;

998LIBYUV_API

1018 dst_stride_uv, Abs(width), Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
1019 return 0;
1020}

1022// Convert YUY2 to I420.
1023LIBYUV_API
1024int YUY2ToI420(const uint8_t* src_yuy2,
1025 int src_stride_yuy2,
1026 uint8_t* dst_y,
1027 int dst_stride_y,
1028 uint8_t* dst_u,
1029 int dst_stride_u,
1030 uint8_t* dst_v,
1031 int dst_stride_v,
1032 int width,
1033 int height) {
1034 int y;
1035 void (*YUY2ToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_yuy2, int src_stride_yuy2,
1036 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
1037 YUY2ToUVRow_C;
1038 void (*YUY2ToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_yuy2, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
1039 YUY2ToYRow_C;
1040 // Negative height means invert the image.
1041 if (height < 0) {
1042 height = -height;
1043 src_yuy2 = src_yuy2 + (height - 1) * src_stride_yuy2;
1044 src_stride_yuy2 = -src_stride_yuy2;
1045 }
1046#if defined(HAS_YUY2TOYROW_SSE2)
1047 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
1048 YUY2ToUVRow = YUY2ToUVRow_Any_SSE2;
1049 YUY2ToYRow = YUY2ToYRow_Any_SSE2;
1050 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1051 YUY2ToUVRow = YUY2ToUVRow_SSE2;
1052 YUY2ToYRow = YUY2ToYRow_SSE2;
1053 }
1054 }
1055#endif
1056#if defined(HAS_YUY2TOYROW_AVX2)
1057 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
1058 YUY2ToUVRow = YUY2ToUVRow_Any_AVX2;
1059 YUY2ToYRow = YUY2ToYRow_Any_AVX2;
1060 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
1061 YUY2ToUVRow = YUY2ToUVRow_AVX2;
1062 YUY2ToYRow = YUY2ToYRow_AVX2;
1063 }
1064 }
1065#endif
1066#if defined(HAS_YUY2TOYROW_NEON)
1067 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1068 YUY2ToYRow = YUY2ToYRow_Any_NEON;
1069 YUY2ToUVRow = YUY2ToUVRow_Any_NEON;
1070 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1071 YUY2ToYRow = YUY2ToYRow_NEON;
1072 YUY2ToUVRow = YUY2ToUVRow_NEON;
1073 }
1074 }
1075#endif
1076#if defined(HAS_YUY2TOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_YUY2TOUVROW_MMI)
1077 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
1078 YUY2ToYRow = YUY2ToYRow_Any_MMI;
1079 YUY2ToUVRow = YUY2ToUVRow_Any_MMI;
1080 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1081 YUY2ToYRow = YUY2ToYRow_MMI;
1082 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1083 YUY2ToUVRow = YUY2ToUVRow_MMI;
1084 }
1085 }
1086 }
1087#endif
1088#if defined(HAS_YUY2TOYROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_YUY2TOUVROW_MSA)
1089 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
1090 YUY2ToYRow = YUY2ToYRow_Any_MSA;
1091 YUY2ToUVRow = YUY2ToUVRow_Any_MSA;
1092 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
1093 YUY2ToYRow = YUY2ToYRow_MSA;
1094 YUY2ToUVRow = YUY2ToUVRow_MSA;
1095 }
1096 }
1097#endif
1098
1099 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
1100 YUY2ToUVRow(src_yuy2, src_stride_yuy2, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1101 YUY2ToYRow(src_yuy2, dst_y, width);
1102 YUY2ToYRow(src_yuy2 + src_stride_yuy2, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
1103 src_yuy2 += src_stride_yuy2 * 2;
1104 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
1105 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
1106 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
1107 }
1108 if (height & 1) {
1109 YUY2ToUVRow(src_yuy2, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1110 YUY2ToYRow(src_yuy2, dst_y, width);
1111 }
1112 return 0;
1113}
1114
1115// Convert UYVY to I420.
1116LIBYUV_API
1117int UYVYToI420(const uint8_t* src_uyvy,
1118 int src_stride_uyvy,
1119 uint8_t* dst_y,
1120 int dst_stride_y,
1121 uint8_t* dst_u,
1122 int dst_stride_u,
1123 uint8_t* dst_v,
1124 int dst_stride_v,
1125 int width,
1126 int height) {
1127 int y;
1128 void (*UYVYToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_uyvy, int src_stride_uyvy,
1129 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
1130 UYVYToUVRow_C;
1131 void (*UYVYToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_uyvy, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
1132 UYVYToYRow_C;
1133 // Negative height means invert the image.
1134 if (height < 0) {
1135 height = -height;
1136 src_uyvy = src_uyvy + (height - 1) * src_stride_uyvy;
1137 src_stride_uyvy = -src_stride_uyvy;
1138 }
1139#if defined(HAS_UYVYTOYROW_SSE2)
1140 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
1141 UYVYToUVRow = UYVYToUVRow_Any_SSE2;
1142 UYVYToYRow = UYVYToYRow_Any_SSE2;
1143 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1144 UYVYToUVRow = UYVYToUVRow_SSE2;
1145 UYVYToYRow = UYVYToYRow_SSE2;
1146 }
1147 }
1148#endif
1149#if defined(HAS_UYVYTOYROW_AVX2)
1150 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
1151 UYVYToUVRow = UYVYToUVRow_Any_AVX2;
1152 UYVYToYRow = UYVYToYRow_Any_AVX2;
1153 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
1154 UYVYToUVRow = UYVYToUVRow_AVX2;
1155 UYVYToYRow = UYVYToYRow_AVX2;
1156 }
1157 }
1158#endif
1159#if defined(HAS_UYVYTOYROW_NEON)
1160 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1161 UYVYToYRow = UYVYToYRow_Any_NEON;
1162 UYVYToUVRow = UYVYToUVRow_Any_NEON;
1163 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1164 UYVYToYRow = UYVYToYRow_NEON;
1165 UYVYToUVRow = UYVYToUVRow_NEON;
1166 }
1167 }
1168#endif
1169#if defined(HAS_UYVYTOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_UYVYTOUVROW_MMI)
1170 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
1171 UYVYToYRow = UYVYToYRow_Any_MMI;
1172 UYVYToUVRow = UYVYToUVRow_Any_MMI;
1173 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1174 UYVYToYRow = UYVYToYRow_MMI;
1175 UYVYToUVRow = UYVYToUVRow_MMI;
1176 }
1177 }
1178#endif
1179#if defined(HAS_UYVYTOYROW_MSA)
1180 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
1181 UYVYToYRow = UYVYToYRow_Any_MSA;
1182 UYVYToUVRow = UYVYToUVRow_Any_MSA;
1183 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
1184 UYVYToYRow = UYVYToYRow_MSA;
1185 UYVYToUVRow = UYVYToUVRow_MSA;
1186 }
1187 }
1188#endif
1189
1190 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
1191 UYVYToUVRow(src_uyvy, src_stride_uyvy, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1192 UYVYToYRow(src_uyvy, dst_y, width);
1193 UYVYToYRow(src_uyvy + src_stride_uyvy, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
1194 src_uyvy += src_stride_uyvy * 2;
1195 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
1196 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
1197 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
1198 }
1199 if (height & 1) {
1200 UYVYToUVRow(src_uyvy, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1201 UYVYToYRow(src_uyvy, dst_y, width);
1202 }
1203 return 0;
1204}
1205
1206// Convert AYUV to NV12.
1207LIBYUV_API
1208int AYUVToNV12(const uint8_t* src_ayuv,
1209 int src_stride_ayuv,
1210 uint8_t* dst_y,
1211 int dst_stride_y,
1212 uint8_t* dst_uv,
1213 int dst_stride_uv,
1214 int width,
1215 int height) {
1216 int y;
1217 void (*AYUVToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_ayuv, int src_stride_ayuv,
1218 uint8_t* dst_uv, int width) = AYUVToUVRow_C;
1219 void (*AYUVToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_ayuv, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
1220 AYUVToYRow_C;
1221 // Negative height means invert the image.
1222 if (height < 0) {
1223 height = -height;
1224 src_ayuv = src_ayuv + (height - 1) * src_stride_ayuv;
1225 src_stride_ayuv = -src_stride_ayuv;
1226 }
1227// place holders for future intel code
1228#if defined(HAS_AYUVTOYROW_SSE2)
1229 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
1230 AYUVToUVRow = AYUVToUVRow_Any_SSE2;
1231 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_Any_SSE2;
1232 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1233 AYUVToUVRow = AYUVToUVRow_SSE2;
1234 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_SSE2;
1235 }
1236 }
1237#endif
1238#if defined(HAS_AYUVTOYROW_AVX2)
1239 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
1240 AYUVToUVRow = AYUVToUVRow_Any_AVX2;
1241 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_Any_AVX2;
1242 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
1243 AYUVToUVRow = AYUVToUVRow_AVX2;
1244 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_AVX2;
1245 }
1246 }
1247#endif
1248
1249#if defined(HAS_AYUVTOYROW_NEON)
1250 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1251 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_Any_NEON;
1252 AYUVToUVRow = AYUVToUVRow_Any_NEON;
1253 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1254 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_NEON;
1255 AYUVToUVRow = AYUVToUVRow_NEON;
1256 }
1257 }
1258#endif
1259
1260 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
1261 AYUVToUVRow(src_ayuv, src_stride_ayuv, dst_uv, width);
1262 AYUVToYRow(src_ayuv, dst_y, width);
1263 AYUVToYRow(src_ayuv + src_stride_ayuv, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
1264 src_ayuv += src_stride_ayuv * 2;
1265 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
1266 dst_uv += dst_stride_uv;
1267 }
1268 if (height & 1) {
1269 AYUVToUVRow(src_ayuv, 0, dst_uv, width);
1270 AYUVToYRow(src_ayuv, dst_y, width);
1271 }
1272 return 0;
1273}
1274
1275// Convert AYUV to NV21.
1276LIBYUV_API
1277int AYUVToNV21(const uint8_t* src_ayuv,
1278 int src_stride_ayuv,
1279 uint8_t* dst_y,
1280 int dst_stride_y,
1281 uint8_t* dst_vu,
1282 int dst_stride_vu,
1283 int width,
1284 int height) {
1285 int y;
1286 void (*AYUVToVURow)(const uint8_t* src_ayuv, int src_stride_ayuv,
1287 uint8_t* dst_vu, int width) = AYUVToVURow_C;
1288 void (*AYUVToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_ayuv, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
1289 AYUVToYRow_C;
1290 // Negative height means invert the image.
1291 if (height < 0) {
1292 height = -height;
1293 src_ayuv = src_ayuv + (height - 1) * src_stride_ayuv;
1294 src_stride_ayuv = -src_stride_ayuv;
1295 }
1296// place holders for future intel code
1297#if defined(HAS_AYUVTOYROW_SSE2)
1298 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
1299 AYUVToVURow = AYUVToVURow_Any_SSE2;
1300 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_Any_SSE2;
1301 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1302 AYUVToVURow = AYUVToVURow_SSE2;
1303 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_SSE2;
1304 }
1305 }
1306#endif
1307#if defined(HAS_AYUVTOYROW_AVX2)
1308 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
1309 AYUVToVURow = AYUVToVURow_Any_AVX2;
1310 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_Any_AVX2;
1311 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
1312 AYUVToVURow = AYUVToVURow_AVX2;
1313 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_AVX2;
1314 }
1315 }
1316#endif
1317
1318#if defined(HAS_AYUVTOYROW_NEON)
1319 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1320 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_Any_NEON;
1321 AYUVToVURow = AYUVToVURow_Any_NEON;
1322 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1323 AYUVToYRow = AYUVToYRow_NEON;
1324 AYUVToVURow = AYUVToVURow_NEON;
1325 }
1326 }
1327#endif
1328
1329 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
1330 AYUVToVURow(src_ayuv, src_stride_ayuv, dst_vu, width);
1331 AYUVToYRow(src_ayuv, dst_y, width);
1332 AYUVToYRow(src_ayuv + src_stride_ayuv, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
1333 src_ayuv += src_stride_ayuv * 2;
1334 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
1335 dst_vu += dst_stride_vu;
1336 }
1337 if (height & 1) {
1338 AYUVToVURow(src_ayuv, 0, dst_vu, width);
1339 AYUVToYRow(src_ayuv, dst_y, width);
1340 }
1341 return 0;
1342}

1344// Convert ARGB to I420.
1345LIBYUV_API
1346int ARGBToI420(const uint8_t* src_argb,
1347 int src_stride_argb,
1348 uint8_t* dst_y,
1349 int dst_stride_y,
1350 uint8_t* dst_u,
1351 int dst_stride_u,
1352 uint8_t* dst_v,
1353 int dst_stride_v,
1354 int width,
1355 int height) {
1356 int y;
1357 void (*ARGBToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb0, int src_stride_argb,
1358 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
1359 ARGBToUVRow_C;
1360 void (*ARGBToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
1361 ARGBToYRow_C;
1362 if (!src_argb || !dst_y || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
1363 return -1;
1364 }
1365 // Negative height means invert the image.
1366 if (height < 0) {
1367 height = -height;
1368 src_argb = src_argb + (height - 1) * src_stride_argb;
1369 src_stride_argb = -src_stride_argb;
1370 }
1371#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_NEON)
1372 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1373 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_NEON;
1374 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_NEON;
1375 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1376 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_NEON;
1377 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1378 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_NEON;
1379 }
1380 }
1381 }
1382#endif
1383#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_SSSE3) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_SSSE3)
1384 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
1385 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_SSSE3;
1386 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_SSSE3;
1387 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1388 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_SSSE3;
1389 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_SSSE3;
1390 }
1391 }
1392#endif
1393#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_AVX2) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_AVX2)
1394 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
1395 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_AVX2;
1396 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_AVX2;
1397 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
1398 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_AVX2;
1399 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_AVX2;
1400 }
1401 }
1402#endif
1403#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_MMI)
1404 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
1405 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_MMI;
1406 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_MMI;
1407 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1408 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_MMI;
1409 }
1410 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1411 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_MMI;
1412 }
1413 }
1414#endif
1415#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_MSA)
1416 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
1417 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_MSA;
1418 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_MSA;
1419 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1420 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_MSA;
1421 }
1422 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
1423 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_MSA;
1424 }
1425 }
1426#endif
1427
1428 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
1429 ARGBToUVRow(src_argb, src_stride_argb, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1430 ARGBToYRow(src_argb, dst_y, width);
1431 ARGBToYRow(src_argb + src_stride_argb, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
1432 src_argb += src_stride_argb * 2;
1433 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
1434 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
1435 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
1436 }
1437 if (height & 1) {
1438 ARGBToUVRow(src_argb, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1439 ARGBToYRow(src_argb, dst_y, width);
1440 }
1441 return 0;
1442}

1444// Convert BGRA to I420.
1445LIBYUV_API
1446int BGRAToI420(const uint8_t* src_bgra,
1447 int src_stride_bgra,
1448 uint8_t* dst_y,
1449 int dst_stride_y,
1450 uint8_t* dst_u,
1451 int dst_stride_u,
1452 uint8_t* dst_v,
1453 int dst_stride_v,
1454 int width,
1455 int height) {
1456 int y;
1457 void (*BGRAToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_bgra0, int src_stride_bgra,
1458 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
1459 BGRAToUVRow_C;
1460 void (*BGRAToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_bgra, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
1461 BGRAToYRow_C;
1462 if (!src_bgra || !dst_y || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
1463 return -1;
1464 }
1465 // Negative height means invert the image.
1466 if (height < 0) {
1467 height = -height;
1468 src_bgra = src_bgra + (height - 1) * src_stride_bgra;
1469 src_stride_bgra = -src_stride_bgra;
1470 }
1471#if defined(HAS_BGRATOYROW_SSSE3) && defined(HAS_BGRATOUVROW_SSSE3)

1473 BGRAToUVRow = BGRAToUVRow_Any_SSSE3;
1474 BGRAToYRow = BGRAToYRow_Any_SSSE3;
1475 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1476 BGRAToUVRow = BGRAToUVRow_SSSE3;
1477 BGRAToYRow = BGRAToYRow_SSSE3;
1478 }
1479 }
1480#endif
1481#if defined(HAS_BGRATOYROW_NEON)
1482 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1483 BGRAToYRow = BGRAToYRow_Any_NEON;
1484 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1485 BGRAToYRow = BGRAToYRow_NEON;
1486 }
1487 }
1488#endif
1489#if defined(HAS_BGRATOUVROW_NEON)
1490 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1491 BGRAToUVRow = BGRAToUVRow_Any_NEON;
1492 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1493 BGRAToUVRow = BGRAToUVRow_NEON;
1494 }
1495 }
1496#endif
1497#if defined(HAS_BGRATOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_BGRATOUVROW_MMI)
1498 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
1499 BGRAToYRow = BGRAToYRow_Any_MMI;
1500 BGRAToUVRow = BGRAToUVRow_Any_MMI;
1501 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1502 BGRAToYRow = BGRAToYRow_MMI;
1503 }
1504 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1505 BGRAToUVRow = BGRAToUVRow_MMI;
1506 }
1507 }
1508#endif
1509#if defined(HAS_BGRATOYROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_BGRATOUVROW_MSA)
1510 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
1511 BGRAToYRow = BGRAToYRow_Any_MSA;
1512 BGRAToUVRow = BGRAToUVRow_Any_MSA;
1513 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1514 BGRAToYRow = BGRAToYRow_MSA;
1515 BGRAToUVRow = BGRAToUVRow_MSA;
1516 }
1517 }
1518#endif
1519
1520 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
1521 BGRAToUVRow(src_bgra, src_stride_bgra, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1522 BGRAToYRow(src_bgra, dst_y, width);
1523 BGRAToYRow(src_bgra + src_stride_bgra, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
1524 src_bgra += src_stride_bgra * 2;
1525 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
1526 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
1527 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
1528 }
1529 if (height & 1) {
1530 BGRAToUVRow(src_bgra, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1531 BGRAToYRow(src_bgra, dst_y, width);
1532 }
1533 return 0;
1534}

1536// Convert ABGR to I420.
1537LIBYUV_API
1538int ABGRToI420(const uint8_t* src_abgr,
1539 int src_stride_abgr,

1541 int dst_stride_y,
1542 uint8_t* dst_u,
1543 int dst_stride_u,
1544 uint8_t* dst_v,
1545 int dst_stride_v,
1546 int width,
1547 int height) {

1551 ABGRToUVRow_C;

1553 ABGRToYRow_C;
1554 if (!src_abgr || !dst_y || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
1555 return -1;
1556 }
1557 // Negative height means invert the image.
1558 if (height < 0) {
1559 height = -height;
1560 src_abgr = src_abgr + (height - 1) * src_stride_abgr;
1561 src_stride_abgr = -src_stride_abgr;
1562 }

1566 ABGRToYRow = ABGRToYRow_Any_SSSE3;

1569 ABGRToYRow = ABGRToYRow_SSSE3;

1571 }
1572#endif
1573#if defined(HAS_ABGRTOYROW_AVX2) && defined(HAS_ABGRTOUVROW_AVX2)

1575 ABGRToUVRow = ABGRToUVRow_Any_AVX2;
1576 ABGRToYRow = ABGRToYRow_Any_AVX2;

1578 ABGRToUVRow = ABGRToUVRow_AVX2;

1582#endif

1589 }
1590#endif

1593 ABGRToUVRow = ABGRToUVRow_Any_NEON;
1594 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1595 ABGRToUVRow = ABGRToUVRow_NEON;
1596 }
1597 }
1598#endif
1599#if defined(HAS_ABGRTOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_ABGRTOUVROW_MMI)
1600 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
1601 ABGRToYRow = ABGRToYRow_Any_MMI;
1602 ABGRToUVRow = ABGRToUVRow_Any_MMI;
1603 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1604 ABGRToYRow = ABGRToYRow_MMI;
1605 }
1606 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1607 ABGRToUVRow = ABGRToUVRow_MMI;
1608 }
1609 }
1610#endif
1611#if defined(HAS_ABGRTOYROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_ABGRTOUVROW_MSA)
1612 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
1613 ABGRToYRow = ABGRToYRow_Any_MSA;
1614 ABGRToUVRow = ABGRToUVRow_Any_MSA;
1615 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1616 ABGRToYRow = ABGRToYRow_MSA;
1617 ABGRToUVRow = ABGRToUVRow_MSA;
1618 }
1619 }
1620#endif
1621
1622 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
1623 ABGRToUVRow(src_abgr, src_stride_abgr, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1624 ABGRToYRow(src_abgr, dst_y, width);
1625 ABGRToYRow(src_abgr + src_stride_abgr, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
1626 src_abgr += src_stride_abgr * 2;
1627 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
1628 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
1629 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
1630 }
1631 if (height & 1) {
1632 ABGRToUVRow(src_abgr, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1633 ABGRToYRow(src_abgr, dst_y, width);
1634 }
1635 return 0;
1636}

1638// Convert RGBA to I420.
1639LIBYUV_API
1640int RGBAToI420(const uint8_t* src_rgba,
1641 int src_stride_rgba,
1642 uint8_t* dst_y,
1643 int dst_stride_y,
1644 uint8_t* dst_u,
1645 int dst_stride_u,
1646 uint8_t* dst_v,
1647 int dst_stride_v,
1648 int width,
1649 int height) {
1650 int y;
1651 void (*RGBAToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgba0, int src_stride_rgba,
1652 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
1653 RGBAToUVRow_C;
1654 void (*RGBAToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgba, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
1655 RGBAToYRow_C;
1656 if (!src_rgba || !dst_y || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
1657 return -1;
1658 }

1660 if (height < 0) {
1661 height = -height;
1662 src_rgba = src_rgba + (height - 1) * src_stride_rgba;
1663 src_stride_rgba = -src_stride_rgba;
1664 }
1665#if defined(HAS_RGBATOYROW_SSSE3) && defined(HAS_RGBATOUVROW_SSSE3)

1670 RGBAToUVRow = RGBAToUVRow_SSSE3;

1675#if defined(HAS_RGBATOYROW_NEON)

1678 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1679 RGBAToYRow = RGBAToYRow_NEON;

1681 }
1682#endif
1683#if defined(HAS_RGBATOUVROW_NEON)

1686 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1687 RGBAToUVRow = RGBAToUVRow_NEON;
1688 }
1689 }
1690#endif
1691#if defined(HAS_RGBATOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_RGBATOUVROW_MMI)
1692 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
1693 RGBAToYRow = RGBAToYRow_Any_MMI;
1694 RGBAToUVRow = RGBAToUVRow_Any_MMI;
1695 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1696 RGBAToYRow = RGBAToYRow_MMI;
1697 }
1698 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1699 RGBAToUVRow = RGBAToUVRow_MMI;
1700 }
1701 }
1702#endif
1703#if defined(HAS_RGBATOYROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_RGBATOUVROW_MSA)
1704 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
1705 RGBAToYRow = RGBAToYRow_Any_MSA;
1706 RGBAToUVRow = RGBAToUVRow_Any_MSA;
1707 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1708 RGBAToYRow = RGBAToYRow_MSA;
1709 RGBAToUVRow = RGBAToUVRow_MSA;
1710 }
1711 }
1712#endif
1713
1714 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
1715 RGBAToUVRow(src_rgba, src_stride_rgba, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1716 RGBAToYRow(src_rgba, dst_y, width);
1717 RGBAToYRow(src_rgba + src_stride_rgba, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
1718 src_rgba += src_stride_rgba * 2;
1719 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
1720 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
1721 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
1722 }
1723 if (height & 1) {
1724 RGBAToUVRow(src_rgba, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1725 RGBAToYRow(src_rgba, dst_y, width);
1726 }
1727 return 0;
1728}
