1738 uint8_t* dst_v,
1739 int dst_stride_v,
1740 int width,
1741 int height) {
1742 int y;
1743#if (defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MSA) || \
1744 defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MMI))
1745 void (*RGB24ToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb24, int src_stride_rgb24,
1746 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
1747 RGB24ToUVRow_C;
1748 void (*RGB24ToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb24, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
1749 RGB24ToYRow_C;
1750#else
1751 void (*RGB24ToARGBRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb, uint8_t* dst_argb, int width) =
1752 RGB24ToARGBRow_C;
1753 void (*ARGBToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb0, int src_stride_argb,
1754 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
1755 ARGBToUVRow_C;
1756 void (*ARGBToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
1757 ARGBToYRow_C;
1758#endif
1759 if (!src_rgb24 || !dst_y || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
1760 return -1;
1761 }
1762 // Negative height means invert the image.
1763 if (height < 0) {
1764 height = -height;
1765 src_rgb24 = src_rgb24 + (height - 1) * src_stride_rgb24;
1766 src_stride_rgb24 = -src_stride_rgb24;
1767 }
1768
1769// Neon version does direct RGB24 to YUV.
1770#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RGB24TOUVROW_NEON)
1771 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1772 RGB24ToUVRow = RGB24ToUVRow_Any_NEON;
1773 RGB24ToYRow = RGB24ToYRow_Any_NEON;
1774 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1775 RGB24ToYRow = RGB24ToYRow_NEON;
1776 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1777 RGB24ToUVRow = RGB24ToUVRow_NEON;
1778 }
1779 }
1780 }
1781// MMI and MSA version does direct RGB24 to YUV.
1782#elif (defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MMI) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MSA))
1783#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_RGB24TOUVROW_MMI)
1784 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
1785 RGB24ToUVRow = RGB24ToUVRow_Any_MMI;
1786 RGB24ToYRow = RGB24ToYRow_Any_MMI;
1787 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1788 RGB24ToYRow = RGB24ToYRow_MMI;
1789 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1790 RGB24ToUVRow = RGB24ToUVRow_MMI;
1791 }
1792 }
1793 }
1794#endif
1795#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_RGB24TOUVROW_MSA)
1796 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
1797 RGB24ToUVRow = RGB24ToUVRow_Any_MSA;
1798 RGB24ToYRow = RGB24ToYRow_Any_MSA;
1799 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1800 RGB24ToYRow = RGB24ToYRow_MSA;
1801 RGB24ToUVRow = RGB24ToUVRow_MSA;
1802 }
1803 }
1804#endif
1805// Other platforms do intermediate conversion from RGB24 to ARGB.
1806#else
1807#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOARGBROW_NEON)
1808 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1809 RGB24ToARGBRow = RGB24ToARGBRow_Any_NEON;
1810 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1811 RGB24ToARGBRow = RGB24ToARGBRow_NEON;
1812 }
1813 }
1814#endif
1815#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOARGBROW_SSSE3)
1816 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
1817 RGB24ToARGBRow = RGB24ToARGBRow_Any_SSSE3;
1818 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1819 RGB24ToARGBRow = RGB24ToARGBRow_SSSE3;
1820 }
1821 }
1822#endif
1823#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_NEON)
1824 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1825 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_NEON;
1826 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_NEON;
1827 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1828 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_NEON;
1829 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1830 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_NEON;
1831 }
1832 }
1833 }
1834#endif
1835#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_SSSE3) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_SSSE3)
1836 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
1837 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_SSSE3;
1838 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_SSSE3;
1839 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1840 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_SSSE3;
1841 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_SSSE3;
1842 }
1843 }
1844#endif
1845#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_AVX2) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_AVX2)
1846 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
1847 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_AVX2;
1848 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_AVX2;
1849 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
1850 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_AVX2;
1851 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_AVX2;
1852 }
1853 }
1854#endif
1855#endif
1856
1857 {
1858#if !(defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MSA) || \
1859 defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MMI))
1860 // Allocate 2 rows of ARGB.
1861 const int kRowSize = (width * 4 + 31) & ~31;
1862 align_buffer_64(row, kRowSize * 2);
1863#endif
1864
1865 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
1866#if (defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MSA) || \
1867 defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MMI))
1868 RGB24ToUVRow(src_rgb24, src_stride_rgb24, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1869 RGB24ToYRow(src_rgb24, dst_y, width);
1870 RGB24ToYRow(src_rgb24 + src_stride_rgb24, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
1871#else
1872 RGB24ToARGBRow(src_rgb24, row, width);
1873 RGB24ToARGBRow(src_rgb24 + src_stride_rgb24, row + kRowSize, width);
1874 ARGBToUVRow(row, kRowSize, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1875 ARGBToYRow(row, dst_y, width);
1876 ARGBToYRow(row + kRowSize, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
1877#endif
1878 src_rgb24 += src_stride_rgb24 * 2;
1879 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
1880 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
1881 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
1882 }
1883 if (height & 1) {
1884#if (defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MSA) || \
1885 defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MMI))
1886 RGB24ToUVRow(src_rgb24, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1887 RGB24ToYRow(src_rgb24, dst_y, width);
1888#else
1889 RGB24ToARGBRow(src_rgb24, row, width);
1890 ARGBToUVRow(row, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
1891 ARGBToYRow(row, dst_y, width);
1892#endif
1893 }
1894#if !(defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MSA) || \
1895 defined(HAS_RGB24TOYROW_MMI))
1896 free_aligned_buffer_64(row);
1897#endif
1898 }
1899 return 0;
1900}
1901
1902// TODO(fbarchard): Use Matrix version to implement I420 and J420.
1903// Convert RGB24 to J420.
1904LIBYUV_API
1905int RGB24ToJ420(const uint8_t* src_rgb24,
1906 int src_stride_rgb24,
1907 uint8_t* dst_y,
1908 int dst_stride_y,
1909 uint8_t* dst_u,
1910 int dst_stride_u,
1911 uint8_t* dst_v,
1912 int dst_stride_v,
1913 int width,
1914 int height) {
1915 int y;
1916#if (defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RGB24TOUVJROW_NEON)) || \
1917 defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MSA) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MMI)
1918 void (*RGB24ToUVJRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb24, int src_stride_rgb24,
1919 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
1920 RGB24ToUVJRow_C;
1921 void (*RGB24ToYJRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb24, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
1922 RGB24ToYJRow_C;
1923#else
1924 void (*RGB24ToARGBRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb, uint8_t* dst_argb, int width) =
1925 RGB24ToARGBRow_C;
1926 void (*ARGBToUVJRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb0, int src_stride_argb,
1927 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
1928 ARGBToUVJRow_C;
1929 void (*ARGBToYJRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
1930 ARGBToYJRow_C;
1931#endif
1932 if (!src_rgb24 || !dst_y || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
1933 return -1;
1934 }
1935 // Negative height means invert the image.
1936 if (height < 0) {
1937 height = -height;
1938 src_rgb24 = src_rgb24 + (height - 1) * src_stride_rgb24;
1939 src_stride_rgb24 = -src_stride_rgb24;
1940 }
1941
1942// Neon version does direct RGB24 to YUV.
1943#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RGB24TOUVJROW_NEON)
1944 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1945 RGB24ToUVJRow = RGB24ToUVJRow_Any_NEON;
1946 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_Any_NEON;
1947 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1948 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_NEON;
1949 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1950 RGB24ToUVJRow = RGB24ToUVJRow_NEON;
1951 }
1952 }
1953 }
1954// MMI and MSA version does direct RGB24 to YUV.
1955#elif (defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MMI) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MSA))
1956#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_RGB24TOUVJROW_MMI)
1957 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
1958 RGB24ToUVJRow = RGB24ToUVJRow_Any_MMI;
1959 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_Any_MMI;
1960 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1961 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_MMI;
1962 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1963 RGB24ToUVJRow = RGB24ToUVJRow_MMI;
1964 }
1965 }
1966 }
1967#endif
1968#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_RGB24TOUVJROW_MSA)
1969 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
1970 RGB24ToUVJRow = RGB24ToUVJRow_Any_MSA;
1971 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_Any_MSA;
1972 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1973 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_MSA;
1974 RGB24ToUVJRow = RGB24ToUVJRow_MSA;
1975 }
1976 }
1977#endif
1978#else
1979#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOARGBROW_NEON)
1980 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1981 RGB24ToARGBRow = RGB24ToARGBRow_Any_NEON;
1982 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
1983 RGB24ToARGBRow = RGB24ToARGBRow_NEON;
1984 }
1985 }
1986#endif
1987#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOARGBROW_SSSE3)
1988 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
1989 RGB24ToARGBRow = RGB24ToARGBRow_Any_SSSE3;
1990 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
1991 RGB24ToARGBRow = RGB24ToARGBRow_SSSE3;
1992 }
1993 }
1994#endif
1995#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVJROW_NEON)
1996 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
1997 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_Any_NEON;
1998 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_Any_NEON;
1999 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2000 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_NEON;
2001 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2002 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_NEON;
2003 }
2004 }
2005 }
2006#endif
2007#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYJROW_SSSE3) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVJROW_SSSE3)
2008 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
2009 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_Any_SSSE3;
2010 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_Any_SSSE3;
2011 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2012 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_SSSE3;
2013 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_SSSE3;
2014 }
2015 }
2016#endif
2017#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYJROW_AVX2) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVJROW_AVX2)
2018 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
2019 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_Any_AVX2;
2020 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_Any_AVX2;
2021 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
2022 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_AVX2;
2023 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_AVX2;
2024 }
2025 }
2026#endif
2027#endif
2028
2029 {
2030#if !((defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RGB24TOUVJROW_NEON)) || \
2031 defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MSA) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MMI))
2032 // Allocate 2 rows of ARGB.
2033 const int kRowSize = (width * 4 + 31) & ~31;
2034 align_buffer_64(row, kRowSize * 2);
2035#endif
2036
2037 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
2038#if ((defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RGB24TOUVJROW_NEON)) || \
2039 defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MSA) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MMI))
2040 RGB24ToUVJRow(src_rgb24, src_stride_rgb24, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2041 RGB24ToYJRow(src_rgb24, dst_y, width);
2042 RGB24ToYJRow(src_rgb24 + src_stride_rgb24, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
2043#else
2044 RGB24ToARGBRow(src_rgb24, row, width);
2045 RGB24ToARGBRow(src_rgb24 + src_stride_rgb24, row + kRowSize, width);
2046 ARGBToUVJRow(row, kRowSize, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2047 ARGBToYJRow(row, dst_y, width);
2048 ARGBToYJRow(row + kRowSize, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
2049#endif
2050 src_rgb24 += src_stride_rgb24 * 2;
2051 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
2052 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
2053 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
2054 }
2055 if (height & 1) {
2056#if ((defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RGB24TOUVJROW_NEON)) || \
2057 defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MSA) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MMI))
2058 RGB24ToUVJRow(src_rgb24, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2059 RGB24ToYJRow(src_rgb24, dst_y, width);
2060#else
2061 RGB24ToARGBRow(src_rgb24, row, width);
2062 ARGBToUVJRow(row, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2063 ARGBToYJRow(row, dst_y, width);
2064#endif
2065 }
2066#if !((defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RGB24TOUVJROW_NEON)) || \
2067 defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MSA) || defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MMI))
2068 free_aligned_buffer_64(row);
2069#endif
2070 }
2071 return 0;
2072}
2073
2074// Convert RAW to I420.
2075LIBYUV_API
2076int RAWToI420(const uint8_t* src_raw,
2077 int src_stride_raw,
2078 uint8_t* dst_y,
2079 int dst_stride_y,
2080 uint8_t* dst_u,
2081 int dst_stride_u,
2082 uint8_t* dst_v,
2083 int dst_stride_v,
2084 int width,
2085 int height) {
2086 int y;
2087#if (defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVROW_NEON)) || \
2088 defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MSA) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MMI)
2089 void (*RAWToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_raw, int src_stride_raw, uint8_t* dst_u,
2090 uint8_t* dst_v, int width) = RAWToUVRow_C;
2091 void (*RAWToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_raw, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
2092 RAWToYRow_C;
2093#else
2094 void (*RAWToARGBRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb, uint8_t* dst_argb, int width) =
2095 RAWToARGBRow_C;
2096 void (*ARGBToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb0, int src_stride_argb,
2097 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
2098 ARGBToUVRow_C;
2099 void (*ARGBToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
2100 ARGBToYRow_C;
2101#endif
2102 if (!src_raw || !dst_y || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
2103 return -1;
2104 }
2105 // Negative height means invert the image.
2106 if (height < 0) {
2107 height = -height;
2108 src_raw = src_raw + (height - 1) * src_stride_raw;
2109 src_stride_raw = -src_stride_raw;
2110 }
2111
2112// Neon version does direct RAW to YUV.
2113#if defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVROW_NEON)
2114 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
2115 RAWToUVRow = RAWToUVRow_Any_NEON;
2116 RAWToYRow = RAWToYRow_Any_NEON;
2117 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2118 RAWToYRow = RAWToYRow_NEON;
2119 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2120 RAWToUVRow = RAWToUVRow_NEON;
2121 }
2122 }
2123 }
2124// MMI and MSA version does direct RAW to YUV.
2125#elif (defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MMI) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MSA))
2126#if defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVROW_MMI)
2127 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
2128 RAWToUVRow = RAWToUVRow_Any_MMI;
2129 RAWToYRow = RAWToYRow_Any_MMI;
2130 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2131 RAWToYRow = RAWToYRow_MMI;
2132 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2133 RAWToUVRow = RAWToUVRow_MMI;
2134 }
2135 }
2136 }
2137#endif
2138#if defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVROW_MSA)
2139 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
2140 RAWToUVRow = RAWToUVRow_Any_MSA;
2141 RAWToYRow = RAWToYRow_Any_MSA;
2142 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2143 RAWToYRow = RAWToYRow_MSA;
2144 RAWToUVRow = RAWToUVRow_MSA;
2145 }
2146 }
2147#endif
2148// Other platforms do intermediate conversion from RAW to ARGB.
2149#else
2150#if defined(HAS_RAWTOARGBROW_NEON)
2151 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
2152 RAWToARGBRow = RAWToARGBRow_Any_NEON;
2153 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2154 RAWToARGBRow = RAWToARGBRow_NEON;
2155 }
2156 }
2157#endif
2158#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_NEON)
2159 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
2160 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_NEON;
2161 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_NEON;
2162 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2163 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_NEON;
2164 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2165 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_NEON;
2166 }
2167 }
2168 }
2169#endif
2170#if defined(HAS_RAWTOARGBROW_SSSE3)
2171 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
2172 RAWToARGBRow = RAWToARGBRow_Any_SSSE3;
2173 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2174 RAWToARGBRow = RAWToARGBRow_SSSE3;
2175 }
2176 }
2177#endif
2178#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_SSSE3) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_SSSE3)
2179 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
2180 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_SSSE3;
2181 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_SSSE3;
2182 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2183 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_SSSE3;
2184 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_SSSE3;
2185 }
2186 }
2187#endif
2188#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_AVX2) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_AVX2)
2189 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
2190 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_AVX2;
2191 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_AVX2;
2192 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
2193 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_AVX2;
2194 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_AVX2;
2195 }
2196 }
2197#endif
2198#endif
2199
2200 {
2201#if !(defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MSA) || \
2202 defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MMI))
2203 // Allocate 2 rows of ARGB.
2204 const int kRowSize = (width * 4 + 31) & ~31;
2205 align_buffer_64(row, kRowSize * 2);
2206#endif
2207
2208 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
2209#if (defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MSA) || \
2210 defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MMI))
2211 RAWToUVRow(src_raw, src_stride_raw, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2212 RAWToYRow(src_raw, dst_y, width);
2213 RAWToYRow(src_raw + src_stride_raw, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
2214#else
2215 RAWToARGBRow(src_raw, row, width);
2216 RAWToARGBRow(src_raw + src_stride_raw, row + kRowSize, width);
2217 ARGBToUVRow(row, kRowSize, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2218 ARGBToYRow(row, dst_y, width);
2219 ARGBToYRow(row + kRowSize, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
2220#endif
2221 src_raw += src_stride_raw * 2;
2222 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
2223 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
2224 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
2225 }
2226 if (height & 1) {
2227#if (defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MSA) || \
2228 defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MMI))
2229 RAWToUVRow(src_raw, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2230 RAWToYRow(src_raw, dst_y, width);
2231#else
2232 RAWToARGBRow(src_raw, row, width);
2233 ARGBToUVRow(row, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2234 ARGBToYRow(row, dst_y, width);
2235#endif
2236 }
2237#if !(defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MSA) || \
2238 defined(HAS_RAWTOYROW_MMI))
2239 free_aligned_buffer_64(row);
2240#endif
2241 }
2242 return 0;
2243}
2244
2245// TODO(fbarchard): Use Matrix version to implement I420 and J420.
2246// Convert RAW to J420.
2247LIBYUV_API
2248int RAWToJ420(const uint8_t* src_raw,
2249 int src_stride_raw,
2250 uint8_t* dst_y,
2251 int dst_stride_y,
2252 uint8_t* dst_u,
2253 int dst_stride_u,
2254 uint8_t* dst_v,
2255 int dst_stride_v,
2256 int width,
2257 int height) {
2258 int y;
2259#if (defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVJROW_NEON)) || \
2260 defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MSA) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MMI)
2261 void (*RAWToUVJRow)(const uint8_t* src_raw, int src_stride_raw,
2262 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
2263 RAWToUVJRow_C;
2264 void (*RAWToYJRow)(const uint8_t* src_raw, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
2265 RAWToYJRow_C;
2266#else
2267 void (*RAWToARGBRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb, uint8_t* dst_argb, int width) =
2268 RAWToARGBRow_C;
2269 void (*ARGBToUVJRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb0, int src_stride_argb,
2270 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
2271 ARGBToUVJRow_C;
2272 void (*ARGBToYJRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
2273 ARGBToYJRow_C;
2274#endif
2275 if (!src_raw || !dst_y || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
2276 return -1;
2277 }
2278 // Negative height means invert the image.
2279 if (height < 0) {
2280 height = -height;
2281 src_raw = src_raw + (height - 1) * src_stride_raw;
2282 src_stride_raw = -src_stride_raw;
2283 }
2284
2285// Neon version does direct RAW to YUV.
2286#if defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVJROW_NEON)
2287 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
2288 RAWToUVJRow = RAWToUVJRow_Any_NEON;
2289 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_Any_NEON;
2290 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2291 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_NEON;
2292 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2293 RAWToUVJRow = RAWToUVJRow_NEON;
2294 }
2295 }
2296 }
2297// MMI and MSA version does direct RAW to YUV.
2298#elif (defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MMI) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MSA))
2299#if defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVJROW_MMI)
2300 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
2301 RAWToUVJRow = RAWToUVJRow_Any_MMI;
2302 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_Any_MMI;
2303 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2304 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_MMI;
2305 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2306 RAWToUVJRow = RAWToUVJRow_MMI;
2307 }
2308 }
2309 }
2310#endif
2311#if defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVJROW_MSA)
2312 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
2313 RAWToUVJRow = RAWToUVJRow_Any_MSA;
2314 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_Any_MSA;
2315 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2316 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_MSA;
2317 RAWToUVJRow = RAWToUVJRow_MSA;
2318 }
2319 }
2320#endif
2321#else
2322#if defined(HAS_RAWTOARGBROW_NEON)
2323 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
2324 RAWToARGBRow = RAWToARGBRow_Any_NEON;
2325 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2326 RAWToARGBRow = RAWToARGBRow_NEON;
2327 }
2328 }
2329#endif
2330#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVJROW_NEON)
2331 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
2332 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_Any_NEON;
2333 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_Any_NEON;
2334 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2335 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_NEON;
2336 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2337 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_NEON;
2338 }
2339 }
2340 }
2341#endif
2342#if defined(HAS_RAWTOARGBROW_SSSE3)
2343 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
2344 RAWToARGBRow = RAWToARGBRow_Any_SSSE3;
2345 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2346 RAWToARGBRow = RAWToARGBRow_SSSE3;
2347 }
2348 }
2349#endif
2350#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYJROW_SSSE3) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVJROW_SSSE3)
2351 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
2352 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_Any_SSSE3;
2353 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_Any_SSSE3;
2354 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2355 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_SSSE3;
2356 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_SSSE3;
2357 }
2358 }
2359#endif
2360#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYJROW_AVX2) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVJROW_AVX2)
2361 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
2362 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_Any_AVX2;
2363 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_Any_AVX2;
2364 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
2365 ARGBToUVJRow = ARGBToUVJRow_AVX2;
2366 ARGBToYJRow = ARGBToYJRow_AVX2;
2367 }
2368 }
2369#endif
2370#endif
2371
2372 {
2373#if !((defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVJROW_NEON)) || \
2374 defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MSA) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MMI))
2375 // Allocate 2 rows of ARGB.
2376 const int kRowSize = (width * 4 + 31) & ~31;
2377 align_buffer_64(row, kRowSize * 2);
2378#endif
2379
2380 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
2381#if ((defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVJROW_NEON)) || \
2382 defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MSA) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MMI))
2383 RAWToUVJRow(src_raw, src_stride_raw, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2384 RAWToYJRow(src_raw, dst_y, width);
2385 RAWToYJRow(src_raw + src_stride_raw, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
2386#else
2387 RAWToARGBRow(src_raw, row, width);
2388 RAWToARGBRow(src_raw + src_stride_raw, row + kRowSize, width);
2389 ARGBToUVJRow(row, kRowSize, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2390 ARGBToYJRow(row, dst_y, width);
2391 ARGBToYJRow(row + kRowSize, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
2392#endif
2393 src_raw += src_stride_raw * 2;
2394 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
2395 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
2396 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
2397 }
2398 if (height & 1) {
2399#if ((defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVJROW_NEON)) || \
2400 defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MSA) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MMI))
2401 RAWToUVJRow(src_raw, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2402 RAWToYJRow(src_raw, dst_y, width);
2403#else
2404 RAWToARGBRow(src_raw, row, width);
2405 ARGBToUVJRow(row, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2406 ARGBToYJRow(row, dst_y, width);
2407#endif
2408 }
2409#if !((defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_NEON) && defined(HAS_RAWTOUVJROW_NEON)) || \
2410 defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MSA) || defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MMI))
2411 free_aligned_buffer_64(row);
2412#endif
2413 }
2414 return 0;
2415}
2416
2417// Convert RGB565 to I420.
2418LIBYUV_API
2419int RGB565ToI420(const uint8_t* src_rgb565,
2420 int src_stride_rgb565,
2421 uint8_t* dst_y,
2422 int dst_stride_y,
2423 uint8_t* dst_u,
2424 int dst_stride_u,
2425 uint8_t* dst_v,
2426 int dst_stride_v,
2427 int width,
2428 int height) {
2429 int y;
2430#if (defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MSA) || \
2431 defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MMI))
2432 void (*RGB565ToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb565, int src_stride_rgb565,
2433 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
2434 RGB565ToUVRow_C;
2435 void (*RGB565ToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb565, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
2436 RGB565ToYRow_C;
2437#else
2438 void (*RGB565ToARGBRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb, uint8_t* dst_argb,
2439 int width) = RGB565ToARGBRow_C;
2440 void (*ARGBToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb0, int src_stride_argb,
2441 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
2442 ARGBToUVRow_C;
2443 void (*ARGBToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
2444 ARGBToYRow_C;
2445#endif
2446 if (!src_rgb565 || !dst_y || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
2447 return -1;
2448 }
2449 // Negative height means invert the image.
2450 if (height < 0) {
2451 height = -height;
2452 src_rgb565 = src_rgb565 + (height - 1) * src_stride_rgb565;
2453 src_stride_rgb565 = -src_stride_rgb565;
2454 }
2455
2456// Neon version does direct RGB565 to YUV.
2457#if defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_NEON)
2458 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
2459 RGB565ToUVRow = RGB565ToUVRow_Any_NEON;
2460 RGB565ToYRow = RGB565ToYRow_Any_NEON;
2461 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2462 RGB565ToYRow = RGB565ToYRow_NEON;
2463 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2464 RGB565ToUVRow = RGB565ToUVRow_NEON;
2465 }
2466 }
2467 }
2468// MMI and MSA version does direct RGB565 to YUV.
2469#elif (defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MMI) || defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MSA))
2470#if defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_RGB565TOUVROW_MMI)
2471 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
2472 RGB565ToUVRow = RGB565ToUVRow_Any_MMI;
2473 RGB565ToYRow = RGB565ToYRow_Any_MMI;
2474 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2475 RGB565ToYRow = RGB565ToYRow_MMI;
2476 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2477 RGB565ToUVRow = RGB565ToUVRow_MMI;
2478 }
2479 }
2480 }
2481#endif
2482#if defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_RGB565TOUVROW_MSA)
2483 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
2484 RGB565ToUVRow = RGB565ToUVRow_Any_MSA;
2485 RGB565ToYRow = RGB565ToYRow_Any_MSA;
2486 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2487 RGB565ToYRow = RGB565ToYRow_MSA;
2488 RGB565ToUVRow = RGB565ToUVRow_MSA;
2489 }
2490 }
2491#endif
2492// Other platforms do intermediate conversion from RGB565 to ARGB.
2493#else
2494#if defined(HAS_RGB565TOARGBROW_SSE2)
2495 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
2496 RGB565ToARGBRow = RGB565ToARGBRow_Any_SSE2;
2497 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2498 RGB565ToARGBRow = RGB565ToARGBRow_SSE2;
2499 }
2500 }
2501#endif
2502#if defined(HAS_RGB565TOARGBROW_AVX2)
2503 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
2504 RGB565ToARGBRow = RGB565ToARGBRow_Any_AVX2;
2505 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2506 RGB565ToARGBRow = RGB565ToARGBRow_AVX2;
2507 }
2508 }
2509#endif
2510#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_SSSE3) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_SSSE3)
2511 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
2512 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_SSSE3;
2513 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_SSSE3;
2514 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2515 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_SSSE3;
2516 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_SSSE3;
2517 }
2518 }
2519#endif
2520#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_AVX2) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_AVX2)
2521 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
2522 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_AVX2;
2523 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_AVX2;
2524 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
2525 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_AVX2;
2526 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_AVX2;
2527 }
2528 }
2529#endif
2530#endif
2531 {
2532#if !(defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MSA) || \
2533 defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MMI))
2534 // Allocate 2 rows of ARGB.
2535 const int kRowSize = (width * 4 + 31) & ~31;
2536 align_buffer_64(row, kRowSize * 2);
2537#endif
2538 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
2539#if (defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MSA) || \
2540 defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MMI))
2541 RGB565ToUVRow(src_rgb565, src_stride_rgb565, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2542 RGB565ToYRow(src_rgb565, dst_y, width);
2543 RGB565ToYRow(src_rgb565 + src_stride_rgb565, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
2544#else
2545 RGB565ToARGBRow(src_rgb565, row, width);
2546 RGB565ToARGBRow(src_rgb565 + src_stride_rgb565, row + kRowSize, width);
2547 ARGBToUVRow(row, kRowSize, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2548 ARGBToYRow(row, dst_y, width);
2549 ARGBToYRow(row + kRowSize, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
2550#endif
2551 src_rgb565 += src_stride_rgb565 * 2;
2552 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
2553 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
2554 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
2555 }
2556 if (height & 1) {
2557#if (defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MSA) || \
2558 defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MMI))
2559 RGB565ToUVRow(src_rgb565, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2560 RGB565ToYRow(src_rgb565, dst_y, width);
2561#else
2562 RGB565ToARGBRow(src_rgb565, row, width);
2563 ARGBToUVRow(row, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2564 ARGBToYRow(row, dst_y, width);
2565#endif
2566 }
2567#if !(defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MSA) || \
2568 defined(HAS_RGB565TOYROW_MMI))
2569 free_aligned_buffer_64(row);
2570#endif
2571 }
2572 return 0;
2573}
2574
2575// Convert ARGB1555 to I420.
2576LIBYUV_API
2577int ARGB1555ToI420(const uint8_t* src_argb1555,
2578 int src_stride_argb1555,
2579 uint8_t* dst_y,
2580 int dst_stride_y,
2581 uint8_t* dst_u,
2582 int dst_stride_u,
2583 uint8_t* dst_v,
2584 int dst_stride_v,
2585 int width,
2586 int height) {
2587 int y;
2588#if (defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MSA) || \
2589 defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MMI))
2590 void (*ARGB1555ToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb1555, int src_stride_argb1555,
2591 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
2592 ARGB1555ToUVRow_C;
2593 void (*ARGB1555ToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb1555, uint8_t* dst_y,
2594 int width) = ARGB1555ToYRow_C;
2595#else
2596 void (*ARGB1555ToARGBRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb, uint8_t* dst_argb,
2597 int width) = ARGB1555ToARGBRow_C;
2598 void (*ARGBToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb0, int src_stride_argb,
2599 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
2600 ARGBToUVRow_C;
2601 void (*ARGBToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
2602 ARGBToYRow_C;
2603#endif
2604 if (!src_argb1555 || !dst_y || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 ||
2605 height == 0) {
2606 return -1;
2607 }
2608 // Negative height means invert the image.
2609 if (height < 0) {
2610 height = -height;
2611 src_argb1555 = src_argb1555 + (height - 1) * src_stride_argb1555;
2612 src_stride_argb1555 = -src_stride_argb1555;
2613 }
2614
2615// Neon version does direct ARGB1555 to YUV.
2616#if defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_NEON)
2617 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
2618 ARGB1555ToUVRow = ARGB1555ToUVRow_Any_NEON;
2619 ARGB1555ToYRow = ARGB1555ToYRow_Any_NEON;
2620 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2621 ARGB1555ToYRow = ARGB1555ToYRow_NEON;
2622 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2623 ARGB1555ToUVRow = ARGB1555ToUVRow_NEON;
2624 }
2625 }
2626 }
2627// MMI and MSA version does direct ARGB1555 to YUV.
2628#elif (defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MMI) || defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MSA))
2629#if defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOUVROW_MMI)
2630 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
2631 ARGB1555ToUVRow = ARGB1555ToUVRow_Any_MMI;
2632 ARGB1555ToYRow = ARGB1555ToYRow_Any_MMI;
2633 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2634 ARGB1555ToYRow = ARGB1555ToYRow_MMI;
2635 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2636 ARGB1555ToUVRow = ARGB1555ToUVRow_MMI;
2637 }
2638 }
2639 }
2640#endif
2641#if defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOUVROW_MSA)
2642 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
2643 ARGB1555ToUVRow = ARGB1555ToUVRow_Any_MSA;
2644 ARGB1555ToYRow = ARGB1555ToYRow_Any_MSA;
2645 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2646 ARGB1555ToYRow = ARGB1555ToYRow_MSA;
2647 ARGB1555ToUVRow = ARGB1555ToUVRow_MSA;
2648 }
2649 }
2650#endif
2651// Other platforms do intermediate conversion from ARGB1555 to ARGB.
2652#else
2653#if defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOARGBROW_SSE2)
2654 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
2655 ARGB1555ToARGBRow = ARGB1555ToARGBRow_Any_SSE2;
2656 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2657 ARGB1555ToARGBRow = ARGB1555ToARGBRow_SSE2;
2658 }
2659 }
2660#endif
2661#if defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOARGBROW_AVX2)
2662 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
2663 ARGB1555ToARGBRow = ARGB1555ToARGBRow_Any_AVX2;
2664 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2665 ARGB1555ToARGBRow = ARGB1555ToARGBRow_AVX2;
2666 }
2667 }
2668#endif
2669#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_SSSE3) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_SSSE3)
2670 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
2671 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_SSSE3;
2672 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_SSSE3;
2673 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2674 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_SSSE3;
2675 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_SSSE3;
2676 }
2677 }
2678#endif
2679#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_AVX2) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_AVX2)
2680 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
2681 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_AVX2;
2682 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_AVX2;
2683 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
2684 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_AVX2;
2685 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_AVX2;
2686 }
2687 }
2688#endif
2689#endif
2690 {
2691#if !(defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MSA) || \
2692 defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MMI))
2693 // Allocate 2 rows of ARGB.
2694 const int kRowSize = (width * 4 + 31) & ~31;
2695 align_buffer_64(row, kRowSize * 2);
2696#endif
2697
2698 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
2699#if (defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MSA) || \
2700 defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MMI))
2701 ARGB1555ToUVRow(src_argb1555, src_stride_argb1555, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2702 ARGB1555ToYRow(src_argb1555, dst_y, width);
2703 ARGB1555ToYRow(src_argb1555 + src_stride_argb1555, dst_y + dst_stride_y,
2704 width);
2705#else
2706 ARGB1555ToARGBRow(src_argb1555, row, width);
2707 ARGB1555ToARGBRow(src_argb1555 + src_stride_argb1555, row + kRowSize,
2708 width);
2709 ARGBToUVRow(row, kRowSize, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2710 ARGBToYRow(row, dst_y, width);
2711 ARGBToYRow(row + kRowSize, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
2712#endif
2713 src_argb1555 += src_stride_argb1555 * 2;
2714 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
2715 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
2716 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
2717 }
2718 if (height & 1) {
2719#if (defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MSA) || \
2720 defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MMI))
2721 ARGB1555ToUVRow(src_argb1555, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2722 ARGB1555ToYRow(src_argb1555, dst_y, width);
2723#else
2724 ARGB1555ToARGBRow(src_argb1555, row, width);
2725 ARGBToUVRow(row, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2726 ARGBToYRow(row, dst_y, width);
2727#endif
2728 }
2729#if !(defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MSA) || \
2730 defined(HAS_ARGB1555TOYROW_MMI))
2731 free_aligned_buffer_64(row);
2732#endif
2733 }
2734 return 0;
2735}
2736
2737// Convert ARGB4444 to I420.
2738LIBYUV_API
2739int ARGB4444ToI420(const uint8_t* src_argb4444,
2740 int src_stride_argb4444,
2741 uint8_t* dst_y,
2742 int dst_stride_y,
2743 uint8_t* dst_u,
2744 int dst_stride_u,
2745 uint8_t* dst_v,
2746 int dst_stride_v,
2747 int width,
2748 int height) {
2749 int y;
2750#if (defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_MMI))
2751 void (*ARGB4444ToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb4444, int src_stride_argb4444,
2752 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
2753 ARGB4444ToUVRow_C;
2754 void (*ARGB4444ToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb4444, uint8_t* dst_y,
2755 int width) = ARGB4444ToYRow_C;
2756#else
2757 void (*ARGB4444ToARGBRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb, uint8_t* dst_argb,
2758 int width) = ARGB4444ToARGBRow_C;
2759 void (*ARGBToUVRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb0, int src_stride_argb,
2760 uint8_t* dst_u, uint8_t* dst_v, int width) =
2761 ARGBToUVRow_C;
2762 void (*ARGBToYRow)(const uint8_t* src_argb, uint8_t* dst_y, int width) =
2763 ARGBToYRow_C;
2764#endif
2765 if (!src_argb4444 || !dst_y || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 ||
2766 height == 0) {
2767 return -1;
2768 }
2769 // Negative height means invert the image.
2770 if (height < 0) {
2771 height = -height;
2772 src_argb4444 = src_argb4444 + (height - 1) * src_stride_argb4444;
2773 src_stride_argb4444 = -src_stride_argb4444;
2774 }
2775
2776// Neon version does direct ARGB4444 to YUV.
2777#if defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_NEON)
2778 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
2779 ARGB4444ToUVRow = ARGB4444ToUVRow_Any_NEON;
2780 ARGB4444ToYRow = ARGB4444ToYRow_Any_NEON;
2781 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2782 ARGB4444ToYRow = ARGB4444ToYRow_NEON;
2783 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2784 ARGB4444ToUVRow = ARGB4444ToUVRow_NEON;
2785 }
2786 }
2787 }
2788#elif defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOUVROW_MMI)
2789 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
2790 ARGB4444ToUVRow = ARGB4444ToUVRow_Any_MMI;
2791 ARGB4444ToYRow = ARGB4444ToYRow_Any_MMI;
2792 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2793 ARGB4444ToYRow = ARGB4444ToYRow_MMI;
2794 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2795 ARGB4444ToUVRow = ARGB4444ToUVRow_MMI;
2796 }
2797 }
2798 }
2799// Other platforms do intermediate conversion from ARGB4444 to ARGB.
2800#else
2801#if defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOARGBROW_SSE2)
2802 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
2803 ARGB4444ToARGBRow = ARGB4444ToARGBRow_Any_SSE2;
2804 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2805 ARGB4444ToARGBRow = ARGB4444ToARGBRow_SSE2;
2806 }
2807 }
2808#endif
2809#if defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOARGBROW_AVX2)
2810 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
2811 ARGB4444ToARGBRow = ARGB4444ToARGBRow_Any_AVX2;
2812 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2813 ARGB4444ToARGBRow = ARGB4444ToARGBRow_AVX2;
2814 }
2815 }
2816#endif
2817#if defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOARGBROW_MSA)
2818 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
2819 ARGB4444ToARGBRow = ARGB4444ToARGBRow_Any_MSA;
2820 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2821 ARGB4444ToARGBRow = ARGB4444ToARGBRow_MSA;
2822 }
2823 }
2824#endif
2825#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_SSSE3) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_SSSE3)
2826 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
2827 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_SSSE3;
2828 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_SSSE3;
2829 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2830 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_SSSE3;
2831 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_SSSE3;
2832 }
2833 }
2834#endif
2835#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_AVX2) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_AVX2)
2836 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
2837 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_AVX2;
2838 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_AVX2;
2839 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
2840 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_AVX2;
2841 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_AVX2;
2842 }
2843 }
2844#endif
2845#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_MMI) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_MMI)
2846 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
2847 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_MMI;
2848 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_MMI;
2849 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2850 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_MMI;
2851 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2852 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_MMI;
2853 }
2854 }
2855 }
2856#endif
2857#if defined(HAS_ARGBTOYROW_MSA) && defined(HAS_ARGBTOUVROW_MSA)
2858 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
2859 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_Any_MSA;
2860 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_Any_MSA;
2861 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2862 ARGBToYRow = ARGBToYRow_MSA;
2863 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
2864 ARGBToUVRow = ARGBToUVRow_MSA;
2865 }
2866 }
2867 }
2868#endif
2869#endif
2870
2871 {
2872#if !(defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_MMI))
2873 // Allocate 2 rows of ARGB.
2874 const int kRowSize = (width * 4 + 31) & ~31;
2875 align_buffer_64(row, kRowSize * 2);
2876#endif
2877
2878 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
2879#if (defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_MMI))
2880 ARGB4444ToUVRow(src_argb4444, src_stride_argb4444, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2881 ARGB4444ToYRow(src_argb4444, dst_y, width);
2882 ARGB4444ToYRow(src_argb4444 + src_stride_argb4444, dst_y + dst_stride_y,
2883 width);
2884#else
2885 ARGB4444ToARGBRow(src_argb4444, row, width);
2886 ARGB4444ToARGBRow(src_argb4444 + src_stride_argb4444, row + kRowSize,
2887 width);
2888 ARGBToUVRow(row, kRowSize, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2889 ARGBToYRow(row, dst_y, width);
2890 ARGBToYRow(row + kRowSize, dst_y + dst_stride_y, width);
2891#endif
2892 src_argb4444 += src_stride_argb4444 * 2;
2893 dst_y += dst_stride_y * 2;
2894 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
2895 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
2896 }
2897 if (height & 1) {
2898#if (defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_MMI))
2899 ARGB4444ToUVRow(src_argb4444, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2900 ARGB4444ToYRow(src_argb4444, dst_y, width);
2901#else
2902 ARGB4444ToARGBRow(src_argb4444, row, width);
2903 ARGBToUVRow(row, 0, dst_u, dst_v, width);
2904 ARGBToYRow(row, dst_y, width);
2905#endif
2906 }
2907#if !(defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_NEON) || defined(HAS_ARGB4444TOYROW_MMI))
2908 free_aligned_buffer_64(row);
2909#endif
2910 }
2911 return 0;
2912}
2913
2914// Convert RGB24 to J400.
2915LIBYUV_API
2916int RGB24ToJ400(const uint8_t* src_rgb24,
2917 int src_stride_rgb24,
2918 uint8_t* dst_yj,
2919 int dst_stride_yj,
2920 int width,
2921 int height) {
2922 int y;
2923 void (*RGB24ToYJRow)(const uint8_t* src_rgb24, uint8_t* dst_yj, int width) =
2924 RGB24ToYJRow_C;
2925 if (!src_rgb24 || !dst_yj || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
2926 return -1;
2927 }
2928 if (height < 0) {
2929 height = -height;
2930 src_rgb24 = src_rgb24 + (height - 1) * src_stride_rgb24;
2931 src_stride_rgb24 = -src_stride_rgb24;
2932 }
2933 // Coalesce rows.
2934 if (src_stride_rgb24 == width * 3 && dst_stride_yj == width) {
2935 width *= height;
2936 height = 1;
2937 src_stride_rgb24 = dst_stride_yj = 0;
2938 }
2939#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_SSSE3)
2940 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
2941 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_Any_SSSE3;
2942 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2943 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_SSSE3;
2944 }
2945 }
2946#endif
2947#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_AVX2)
2948 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
2949 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_Any_AVX2;
2950 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
2951 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_AVX2;
2952 }
2953 }
2954#endif
2955#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_NEON)
2956 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
2957 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_Any_NEON;
2958 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2959 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_NEON;
2960 }
2961 }
2962#endif
2963#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MMI)
2964 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
2965 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_Any_MMI;
2966 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
2967 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_MMI;
2968 }
2969 }
2970#endif
2971#if defined(HAS_RGB24TOYJROW_MSA)
2972 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
2973 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_Any_MSA;
2974 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
2975 RGB24ToYJRow = RGB24ToYJRow_MSA;
2976 }
2977 }
2978#endif
2979
2980 for (y = 0; y < height; ++y) {
2981 RGB24ToYJRow(src_rgb24, dst_yj, width);
2982 src_rgb24 += src_stride_rgb24;
2983 dst_yj += dst_stride_yj;
2984 }
2985 return 0;
2986}

2988// Convert RAW to J400.
2989LIBYUV_API
2990int RAWToJ400(const uint8_t* src_raw,
2991 int src_stride_raw,
2992 uint8_t* dst_yj,
2993 int dst_stride_yj,
2994 int width,
2995 int height) {
2996 int y;
2997 void (*RAWToYJRow)(const uint8_t* src_raw, uint8_t* dst_yj, int width) =
2998 RAWToYJRow_C;
2999 if (!src_raw || !dst_yj || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
3000 return -1;
3001 }
3002 if (height < 0) {
3003 height = -height;
3004 src_raw = src_raw + (height - 1) * src_stride_raw;
3005 src_stride_raw = -src_stride_raw;
3006 }
3007 // Coalesce rows.
3008 if (src_stride_raw == width * 3 && dst_stride_yj == width) {
3009 width *= height;
3010 height = 1;
3011 src_stride_raw = dst_stride_yj = 0;
3012 }
3013#if defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_SSSE3)
3014 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSSE3)) {
3015 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_Any_SSSE3;
3016 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
3017 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_SSSE3;
3018 }
3019 }
3020#endif
3021#if defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_AVX2)
3022 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
3023 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_Any_AVX2;
3024 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
3025 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_AVX2;
3026 }
3027 }
3028#endif
3029#if defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_NEON)
3030 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
3031 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_Any_NEON;
3032 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
3033 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_NEON;
3034 }
3035 }
3036#endif
3037#if defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MMI)
3038 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
3039 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_Any_MMI;
3040 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
3041 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_MMI;
3042 }
3043 }
3044#endif
3045#if defined(HAS_RAWTOYJROW_MSA)
3046 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
3047 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_Any_MSA;
3048 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
3049 RAWToYJRow = RAWToYJRow_MSA;
3050 }
3051 }
3052#endif
3053
3054 for (y = 0; y < height; ++y) {
3055 RAWToYJRow(src_raw, dst_yj, width);
3056 src_raw += src_stride_raw;
3057 dst_yj += dst_stride_yj;
3058 }
3059 return 0;
3060}
3061
3062static void SplitPixels(const uint8_t* src_u,
3063 int src_pixel_stride_uv,
3064 uint8_t* dst_u,
3065 int width) {
3066 int i;
3067 for (i = 0; i < width; ++i) {
3068 *dst_u = *src_u;
3069 ++dst_u;
3070 src_u += src_pixel_stride_uv;
3071 }
3072}
3073
3074// Convert Android420 to I420.
3075LIBYUV_API
3076int Android420ToI420(const uint8_t* src_y,
3077 int src_stride_y,
3078 const uint8_t* src_u,
3079 int src_stride_u,
3080 const uint8_t* src_v,
3081 int src_stride_v,
3082 int src_pixel_stride_uv,
3083 uint8_t* dst_y,
3084 int dst_stride_y,
3085 uint8_t* dst_u,
3086 int dst_stride_u,
3087 uint8_t* dst_v,
3088 int dst_stride_v,
3089 int width,
3090 int height) {
3091 int y;
3092 const ptrdiff_t vu_off = src_v - src_u;
3093 int halfwidth = (width + 1) >> 1;
3094 int halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
3095 if (!src_u || !src_v || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
3096 return -1;
3097 }
3098 // Negative height means invert the image.
3099 if (height < 0) {
3100 height = -height;
3101 halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
3102 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
3103 src_u = src_u + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_u;
3104 src_v = src_v + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_v;
3105 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
3106 src_stride_u = -src_stride_u;
3107 src_stride_v = -src_stride_v;
3108 }
3109
3110 if (dst_y) {
3111 CopyPlane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, width, height);
3112 }
3113
3114 // Copy UV planes as is - I420
3115 if (src_pixel_stride_uv == 1) {
3116 CopyPlane(src_u, src_stride_u, dst_u, dst_stride_u, halfwidth, halfheight);
3117 CopyPlane(src_v, src_stride_v, dst_v, dst_stride_v, halfwidth, halfheight);
3118 return 0;
3119 // Split UV planes - NV21
3120 }
3121 if (src_pixel_stride_uv == 2 && vu_off == -1 &&
3122 src_stride_u == src_stride_v) {
3123 SplitUVPlane(src_v, src_stride_v, dst_v, dst_stride_v, dst_u, dst_stride_u,
3124 halfwidth, halfheight);
3125 return 0;
3126 // Split UV planes - NV12
3127 }
3128 if (src_pixel_stride_uv == 2 && vu_off == 1 && src_stride_u == src_stride_v) {
3129 SplitUVPlane(src_u, src_stride_u, dst_u, dst_stride_u, dst_v, dst_stride_v,
3130 halfwidth, halfheight);
3131 return 0;
3132 }
3133
3134 for (y = 0; y < halfheight; ++y) {
3135 SplitPixels(src_u, src_pixel_stride_uv, dst_u, halfwidth);
3136 SplitPixels(src_v, src_pixel_stride_uv, dst_v, halfwidth);
3137 src_u += src_stride_u;
3138 src_v += src_stride_v;
3139 dst_u += dst_stride_u;
3140 dst_v += dst_stride_v;
3141 }
3142 return 0;
3143}
